trans-unit.source: Enumerates values of the recognizer's state.

<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> encapsulates the running state of the default speech recognition engine for clients using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> to access the Windows Desktop Speech Recognition Technology service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> 封装的客户端使用的默认语音识别引擎的运行状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>来访问 Windows 桌面语音识别技术服务。

trans-unit.source: Applications can obtain the current state of the desktop recognition engine as a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> object by querying the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以获取作为桌面识别引擎的当前状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>对象通过查询<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>实例。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the state of the desktop recognition engine after it changes, applications can query the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> object passed to a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的桌面识别引擎的状态，它将更改后，应用程序可以查询<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>对象传递给处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instances run in-process and their running state is under the control of the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> 在进程中运行的实例及其运行状态下，应用程序的控制。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> does not contain a property to return a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>不包含一个属性来返回<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>对象。

trans-unit.source: The state of a desktop speech recognition server is a read-only property and cannot be controlled programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 桌面语音识别服务器的状态是只读属性，不能以编程方式进行控制。

trans-unit.source: Users can change a shared speech recognizer's state using the Speech Recognition user interface (UI) or through the **Speech Recognition** member of the Windows **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以更改使用的语音识别用户界面 (UI) 的共享的语音识别器状态或通过**语音识别**成员的 windows**控制面板**。

trans-unit.source: Both the **On** and **Sleep** settings in the Speech Recognition UI correspond to the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: 这两个**上**和**睡眠**语音识别 UI 中的设置对应于`Listening`状态。

trans-unit.source: The **Off** setting in the Speech Recognition UI corresponds to Stopped.
trans-unit.target: **关闭**语音识别用户界面中的设置对应于已停止。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> is the other property that affects the readiness of a shared speech recognition engine to receive and process speech input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> 是会影响接收和处理语音输入共享的语音识别引擎的准备情况的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> to control whether or not a shared speech recognition engine's grammars are active for recognition.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>来控制共享的语音识别引擎的语法是否活动进行识别。

trans-unit.source: However, changing the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property has no effect on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，更改<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>属性不起任何作用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>属性。

trans-unit.source: Information such as the description, the supported culture and audio formats, and the recognition engine name is encapsulated in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> type.
trans-unit.target: 如说明、 受支持的区域性和音频格式，以及识别引擎名称信息封装在<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example below, an application displays the state of a recognizer in its implementation of a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，应用程序显示在其实现中的处理程序识别器的状态<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The recognition engine is available to receive and analyze audio input.
trans-unit.target: 识别引擎可接收和分析音频输入。

trans-unit.source: The recognition engine is not receiving or analyzing audio input.
trans-unit.target: 识别引擎不接收或分析音频输入。
